parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set group formation.
Formation is one of: 
* '''"COLUMN"'''
* '''"STAG COLUMN"'''
* '''"WEDGE"'''
* '''"ECH LEFT"'''
* '''"ECH RIGHT"'''
* '''"VEE"'''
* '''"LINE"'''
* '''"FILE"''' (ArmA)
* '''"DIAMOND"''' (ArmA)

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> group '''setFormation''' formation

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> group: [[Object]] or [[Group]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> formation: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>_groupOne setFormation "LINE"</inner><close></pre></close></ext>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Mission_Editor:_Waypoints#Formation|formations description]], [[formation]]
</value></part></template>
